languages.text: "С первого до последнего слова? Вы явно плохо знаете маршала, поэтому просто поверьте мне".
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
languages.original_text: "С первого до последнего слова? Вы явно плохо знаете маршала, поэтому просто поверьте мне".

traits.locale_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
"Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

languages.text: 「すべての言葉がですが？あなたは将帥のことをよく知らないのでしょう。ですから、私の言葉を信用してくれてもいいですよ」
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての言葉がですが？あなたは将帥のことをよく知らないのでしょう。ですから、私の言葉を信用してくれてもいいですよ」

languages.text: "Jedes Wort? Ihr kennt den Marschall nicht so gut, also müsst Ihr es mir wohl glauben."
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Wort? Ihr kennt den Marschall nicht so gut, also müsst Ihr es mir wohl glauben."

languages.text: « Chacun de ses mots transpire d'émotion, vous ne le sentez pas ? Mais c'est vrai que vous ne connaissez que très peu le maréchal. Croyez-moi, il était ému d'écrire ce message. »
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: « Chacun de ses mots transpire d'émotion, vous ne le sentez pas ? Mais c'est vrai que vous ne connaissez que très peu le maréchal. Croyez-moi, il était ému d'écrire ce message. »

languages.text: «¿En cada palabra? Usted no conoce al mariscal tan bien como yo, así que fíese de mí».
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: «¿En cada palabra? Usted no conoce al mariscal tan bien como yo, así que fíese de mí».

languages.text: “每个字都很真诚？你不太了解元帅这个人，这方面你可以相信我的话。”
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: “每个字都很真诚？你不太了解元帅这个人，这方面你可以相信我的话。”

languages.text: "Her kelimesi. Miralay'ı o kadar iyi tanımıyorsunuz. Sözüme güvenin."
languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."

traits.locale_text: "Her kelimesi. Miralay'ı o kadar iyi tanımıyorsunuz. Sözüme güvenin."

languages.original_text: "Every word? You don't know the Marshal that well, so you can take it from me."
